rdf:Description.dc:title: Wang and Lipsius's 1995 kinetic analysis of an acetylcholine induced signal transduction cascade resulting in ATP-sensitive K+ channel activation.

bqs:JournalArticle.dc:title: beta-Adrenergic Stimulation Induces Acetylcholine to Activate ATP-Sensitive K+ Current in Cat Atrial Myocytes
